summary: This document contains subscriber information and billing details for Jeffrey E. Epstein's Cingular Wireless account. It includes account status, billing address, and detailed records of voice usage and charges over a specified period. This document contains detailed billing information for a Cingular Wireless account, including call logs, charges, and usage details for the specified billing cycle. It highlights numerous incoming and outgoing calls, primarily from New York, along with various message retrievals and unlimited weekend minutes. This document contains detailed billing information for a Cingular Wireless account, including call logs and usage details from September 24, 2005, to October 3, 2005. It highlights various calls made to and from New York, Miami, and other locations, with a focus on unlimited weekend minutes and message retrievals. This document contains detailed billing information for a Cingular Wireless account, including call logs, text messages, and charges incurred during a specified billing cycle. The data reflects various incoming and outgoing calls, as well as text message usage, primarily in New York and other locations. This document contains detailed call logs for a Cingular Wireless account, showing incoming calls, their timestamps, and associated charges. The data appears to be part of a billing cycle report, indicating usage patterns and charges incurred during the specified period. This document contains a detailed account of voice usage and text messaging for a specific Cingular Wireless account, including incoming calls, their timestamps, and charges. It appears to be a pre-bill format report that may not represent a complete record of all calls.
